body:
Hi Greg,


Thanks for the additional input and again also to Carsten to getting the 
conversation to this point! So just to confirm it looks like if I grab 
the following from CVS I will be ok:


    * rtrace.c
    * rview.c
    * ambient.c
    * ray.h
    * rpict.c


Correct?


-Jack
